form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screeneded by NARA, 4/27/2023, Bentleysâ€™ Market Established 1917

full_text: by NAIVA, (714) 626-1637 WILLIAM BENTLEY Bentleys' Market FRED BENTLEY Established 1917 235 Yale Avenue Post Office Box 575 Claremont, California 91711 February 15, 1975 U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 Dear Sirs: This letter is in reference to the application of Mr. Bruno Palos of Claremont California for United States citizenship. Mr. Palos has been continuously employed with this company for over twenty five years and has always served his duties faithfully and diligently. He is a trusted and respected member of this firm. Mr. Palos and his family have lived in this community during all the years of his employment. The entire family is well known and respected in Claremont and they are all people of the highest integrity. If I can be of any other help to you or to Mr. Palos in having his application processed please feel free to contact me at once. Sincerely Yours, William L. Bentley
